review: The antenna seems very weak on this device.  I have an app on my phone that I can use around my house to check internet speed and when I put it in the same vicinity as this, I get 40+ Mbps download speeds.  I also use my XBox 360 wirelessly on the same TV using the Amazon app with no issues.  The video quality is constantly switching from HD to SD or stopping altogether to buffer the video because this device seems to not sustain a good connection.When it does work, it is pretty fast and easy to use.  I ended up tossing it because I just couldn't take the unreliable behavior.
author: Jesse D

review: Very disappointed in the way the firestick reduces quality of netflix. Amazon prime quality is superb but netflix horrible. I still have Roku on same network on another HDMI port on the same TV. Netflix is great on ROKU but not firestick. Looks like Amazon sabotaging competition because it can.Other than that, so far so good
